Class Prompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • Prompt

  • public class Prompt
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide some utilities for user input. We want to enhance the Scanner class, so that our programs can recover from "bad" input, and also provide a way to limit numerical input to a range of values.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Prompt()

      Prompts for an integer from the keyboard

      Prompts for an integer from the keyboard within a range of values.
